meanings.definition: White blood cells that help the body fight infection.
meanings.sent1: Leucocytes are important for fighting off germs in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors check the leucocytes in your blood to see if you have an infection.
meanings.sent3: The leucocytes in the body are like tiny soldiers protecting us from invaders.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against illness, leucocytes are the frontline defenders.
meanings.sent5: Imagine leucocytes as tiny warriors battling harmful bacteria to keep you healthy.

meanings.definition: A type of blood cell that is colorless and helps the body fight disease.
meanings.sent1: Colorless leucocytes play a crucial role in protecting our health.
meanings.sent2: When you're sick, your body produces more leucocytes to fight off the disease.
meanings.sent3: The leucocytes in our blood are like invisible shields against sickness.
meanings.sent4: Disease-fighting leucocytes are the unsung heroes of our immune system.
meanings.sent5: Visualize leucocytes as invisible guardians standing ready to defend your body.
